lines.i: Information on whether a particular medical treatment or invasive/manipulative procedure was performed during this pregnancy specifically in the treatment of the pregnancy, management of labor and/or delivery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.39"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:240)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @negationInd (CONF:241)
The negation indicator defines whether or not the specified procedure was perfomred during the course of delivery. A value of true indicates a procedure was NOT performed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:242), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Obstetric Procedures (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7136 DYNAMIC (CONF:243)
A code value that indicates the nature of the procedure - it specifies the nature of the obstetric procedure about which information is provided.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:240)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @negationInd (CONF:241)
The negation indicator defines whether or not the specified procedure was perfomred during the course of delivery. A value of true indicates a procedure was NOT performed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code with @xsi:type="CE" (CONF:242), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Obstetric Procedures (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7136 DYNAMIC (CONF:243)
A code value that indicates the nature of the procedure - it specifies the nature of the obstetric procedure about which information is provided.
